title: Hidden Face (1954 Crime) DANGER!..These Girls are Hot!  An Ed Wood Film

sources.title: Hidden Face (1954 Crime) DANGER!..These Girls are Hot!  An Ed Wood Film
sources.description:
Hothead Don Gregor teams up with smooth criminal Vic Brady for a theater heist, but when their plan explodes, Don's surgeon dad gets forced into a wild face-swap scheme. Now with new identities but the same old problems, they learn bandages can't hide bullets as Inspector Johns closes in!

Original title: Jail Bait (1954)  Alternative title: The Hidden Face

üé¨ CREDITS

Writers: Ed Wood (story and screenplay), Alex Gordon (story)

Herbert Rawlinson (final role) as Dr. Gregor
Lyle Talbot (Ed Wood regular) as Inspector Johns
